DOC.detailed_description: This study seek understand genetic cause condition affect development genitals , disorder sex development ( DSD ) hypospadias , impact family receive genetic result . The investigator recruit individual DSD and/or hypospadias without clear genetic cause along family member research study . The investigator collect sample genetic study . The investigator review clinical record history , labs physical exam information . The investigator also build tissue bank blood , urine , discard tissues surgery . The investigator return result genetic test parents/guardians child DSD/hypospadias complete questionnaire assess impact receive result .
DOC.criteria: Genital gonadal abnormality evidence physical examination imaging ( include limit hypospadias , microphallus , clitoromegaly , ambiguous genitalia ) , cause identify standard clinical evaluation Inability provide inform consent
